pages.text: This is a squirrel. They are known for their flame-colored fluffy tail, and for being pretty fast!

pages.title: About the Squirrel
pages.text: Squirrels can be found in biomes such as forests and plains. $(br2)Squirrels tend to stay near tree logs, and they will run away if you scare them. They are pretty fast so you might want to avoid scaring them or you will have to give chase! $(br2)Squirrels are one of the most delicious types of prey you can find, so it is worth it trying to catch one.$(br)
